https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hEessJXKmNYt91u49SiP9EsuGbX.jpg Hari loves getting into fights just for the sake of it and his father is tired of dealing with the consequences. But what happens when Hari is thrown into a situation that even his aggressive self doesn't want to deal with? Chalo
